TopicTitle: Quite possibly the best Kerbal name I've ever seen

Articles.Content:
So I went into my Sandbox save to test out the new stuff, and found this guy in my applicants:

And yes, he does have the elusive Badass trait (like Jeb)

I think 0.23 might have added Billy-Somethings to the Kerbal name generator, because another one turned up in my Career save.
Is this a reference to Billy-bob Thornton's role in 'Astronaut farmer'?
Back in 0.22 I had Billy-Bobdan, I'm thinking they just had the prefix "Billy-Bob" and you found one. They're great, things like that!
I had Billy-Bobfen on my Minmus mission, I have a video of him on Youtube. Brave soul he was....though he had a look of sheer horror during the liftoff LOL.
I turned my Billy-Bobdin into a guest of the Kerb Kerman Show. It's one of the best random-name prefixes you can get, I think.
Anyone with Billy Bodean?

Is this a reference to Billy-bob Thornton's role in 'Astronaut farmer'?

Pff, I'm going with his role in 'Armageddon'.
No one beats Mitbin... don't ask.
There was someone who posted that his KSP generated Danger Kerman
I personally like that you can get Bilbo, Samwise, and Merry Kerman. Send those three off to launch the One Decoupler into the sun if you somehow get all three in one save.
I'm rather fond of Doodzor and Doodhat.

I got billy-bobler.

Died however in a spaceplane incident.
I haven't seen any "Billy-" Kerbals, but today in my new 0.23 career mode save, the first Astronaut Trainee in the list to hire was Jim (Lovell?) Kerman. I've had Gus (Grissom) before but never Jim.
Before the bad name filter I think someone got a dildo kerman.

Before the bad name filter I think someone got a dildo kerman.

Wait, they are filtering the names now?!

I've been on the lookout for Dildo Kerman for a long time - I was going to get him to set up a 1 man colony on Eeloo!

My favorite that I've had was Doodmon Kerman. Every time I switched to his craft, I swear I could hear reggae playing.

Edited December 18, 2013 by Merinsan

My favorite that I've had was Doodmon Kerman. Every time I switched to his craft, I swear I could hear reggae playing.

That is a good name. A very, very, very good name. I thought of Pokemon before reggae, is that just me?

The best kerbal name is Dildin.

Come on, it's fun to say, like collywobbles, admit it.

Second best goes to Wobney, Danger and Mitler.
For anyone who is wondering, Billy-Bobs have been here for a long time.
I had Billy-Bobfrey in my .22 sandbox save. He was my first Kerbal to set foot on Gilly.

My favorite that I've had was Doodmon Kerman. Every time I switched to his craft, I swear I could hear reggae playing.

Thank you... now my boss wants to know what I'm laughing at.

The best kerbal name is Dildin.

Come on, it's fun to say, like collywobbles, admit it.

Second best goes to Wobney, Danger and Mitler.

I have Dilden among my few kerbonauts who've been around the block. xD

I got Tom Kerman. I'm now wondering around which planet I will strand him until his oxygen runs out.

And there is Munman Kerman. Top candidate for overseer of a munbase, should I ever build one.
Billy-bobald,the stupidest and most cowardly pilot in all of the KSP.
I had Billy-Bobbro in .18 or so - still the best name I've had in my games by a fair distance
I got Doing Kerman once
